channel.title: Rucruiting:Need help running a Runescape server on a web host!
channel.description: I have registered for a free web hosting site at [url=http://eatj.com]eatj.com[/url] which supports java that I want to run our runescape server from! If this is possible to do I will need a staff who know how to run the server on this site! If you know something about running java on a website please pm me or post here telling what you know about this sort of thing, and if I like it I will pm you with the username and password of the account on this site so you may help out on making this the best server ever!!!

item.title: Rucruiting:Need help running a Runescape server on a web host!
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

I’m afraid you have bought the wrong kind of host, you would need to buy a VPS (virtual private server ) or a dedicated server, i suggest this website: vaserv.com for a VPS server theyre cheap and good quality and have a wide range of OS. I myself have a debian VPS which is working great and it only cost £4 a month.

Read full topic
item.source: Rucruiting:Need help running a Runescape server on a web host!
